name: Crashy Road
description:
You escaped a prison with your car and trusty AI driver and have to jump over the final wall to escape the police. You and your AI driver have to cooperate to keep the cops at bay and collect all the energy orbs, which unlocks the final ramp.

╔═ ⚠ ═════════════════════════════════════════ As the WebGl version sadly has a shader bug, we highly encourage you to download the game for a better experience. ╚══════════════════════════════════════════════
